semantics.label: translate:: Task Description
semantics.default: translate:: Drag images from the left to match them with corresponding images on the right
semantics.description: translate:: A guide telling the user how to solve this task.

fields.label: translate:: Alternative text for Image
fields.description: translate:: Describe what can be seen in the photo. The text is read by text-to-speech tools needed by visually impaired users.

fields.label: translate:: Matching Image
fields.description: translate:: An optional image to match against instead of using two cards with the same image.

fields.label: translate:: Alternative text for Matching Image
fields.description: translate:: Describe what can be seen in the photo. The text is read by text-to-speech tools needed by visually impaired users.

semantics.label: translate:: Behavioural settings
semantics.description: translate:: These options will let you control how the game behaves.

fields.label: translate:: Add button for retrying when the game is over
translate:: Feedback text
fields.description: translate:: Feedback text, variables available: @score and @total. Example: 'You got @score of @total possible points'
